
# Novalnet AG 
![novalnet](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/novalnet/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `novalnet` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Novalnet AG 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Novalnet is a leading payment institute providing solutions to companies worldwide. By the supervision through BaFin (highest financial institute which controls all financial institutions in Germany) and the money management by escrow accounts, the merchant's earnings are 100% save. Novalnet offers a full service payment solution, which not only covers a broad range of payment options for your B2B and B2C customers, but also additional services and technical assistance for an effective implementation and optimising the online and offline payment process. Our existing merchants love the clever and user friendly admin portal, our real-time monitoring across all payment methods and the user-friendly checkout for higher conversion rates. Novalnet's portfolio includes all known payment methods, fraud modules and risk management, automated billing, receivables management, subsciption and member management and more.
